original_text: Thus all the work that Solomon made for the house of the Lord was finished: and Solomon brought in all the things that David his father had dedicated; and the silver, and the gold, and all the instruments, put he among the treasures of the house of God.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전을 위하여 만드는 모든 일을 마친지라 이에 솔로몬이 그의 아버지 다윗이 드린 은과 금과 모든 기구를 가져다가 하나님의 전 곳간에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: Thus all the work that Solomon made for the house of the Lord was finished
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 솔로몬이 주의 집을 위해 만든 모든 일이 끝났고

sentences.original_text: and Solomon brought in all the things
that David his father had dedicated
and the silver, and the gold, and all the instruments,
put he among the treasures of the house of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님의 집 보물들 가운데 두었더라
